General.Name: Global Ports Holding Plc
General.Description: Global Ports Holding Plc engages in the operation of ports in Turkey, Montenegro, Malta, Spain, Bahamas, Antigua and Barbuda, Italy, and Croatia. The company operates through Western Mediterranean and Atlantic Region, Central Mediterranean Region, Americas Region, Eastern Mediterranean and Adriatic region, and Other Operations. It operates cruise ports for serving cruise liners, ferries, yachts, individual passengers, container ships, and bulk, and general cargo ships. In addition, the company offers terminal services comprising of embarkation, disembarkation, check-in, luggage operations, and security related services. Further, it provides port services, including berthing and mooring; marine services, such as  pilotage and towage. The company operates 27 ports in 14 countries. Global Ports Holding Plc was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. The company is a subsidiary of Global Yatirim Holding A.S.
